_json.gridTitle: St Patrick, Gold and the best Medieval Beef Stew you ever tasted!
_json.description: lostpastremembered: St Patrick, Gold and the best Medieval Beef Stew you ever tasted! Ingredients  1 ½ pounds lean beef stew meat (mine is from Grazin Angus Acres) 2 T suet or rendered beef fat or oil 2 cups chopped leeks 2 cups chopped fennel 1 stalk celery 1 cup red wine 3 T Italian Forest honey (Rigoni di Asiago  is sold at Gourmet food shops in the US) ¼ c red wine vinegar (1/3 c if not using verjus) 2 T verjus (optional) salt  to taste 1t ground pepper ¼ t cloves 2 t spikenard root  OR ½ t
